traits.name: Glory
entries: The reigar's Armor Class includes its Charisma modifier.

traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The reigar can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The reigar makes two Trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6 damage) force damage if Hastain is wearing its talarith.

actions.name: Chromatic Bolt
entries: Ranged Spell atk +10 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. 22 (5d8 damage) damage of a type chosen by Hastain from the following list: cold, fire, lightning, or radiant.

actions.name: Summon Duplicate (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Using its talarith, Hastain summons a duplicate of itself. The duplicate obeys Hastain's commands and uses Hastain's statistics, except it is an unaligned Construct that doesn't have a talarith of its own. The duplicate takes its turn immediately after Hastain. It vanishes after 1 hour or when it is reduced to 0 hit points.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The reigar casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):
